default: ^This is the default knot, we should not be reading this in game
a: ^Please, do buy this thing from me ! It appeared from my hat one day and won't leave me alone anymore !! It's scary and annoying :(
^It keeps teleporting everywhere at home, I'm sure someone would be interested in it, it's a very powerful magic.. Yes..
b: ^You are my savior, thank you !! I can finally sleep at night without hearing teleporting noises everywhere !
c: ^can't you offer just a little more ? I'm sure it's still worth its price no ? :(
d: ^Nooooo please can't you buy it for a little lower ? or did all your money teleport elsewhere ?
